title: My client wont launch and says to reinstall alpha client even though i already have
body: When i launch my client it brings up a prompt which says " League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install alpha client to try again" how do i fix this?

replies.body:
You *may* be able to resolve this with a quick workaround that sometimes works for others, otherwise, you'll have to complete a clean reinstall of League using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to fix this. The quick fix is to hop into your installation folder for League (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and *delete* the **LeagueClient.exe** file before launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file in the same folder. Be sure to right-click and launch the application as administrator.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
I would advise sending a ticket to Riot, as this seems serious and imperative that it be fixed. You can send them a request for help through here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
